lead_paragraph: Triple defending Olympic wrestling champion Kaori Icho presented a window of hope for her Rio Games rivals after losing her first bout in 13 years on Friday to a 21-year-old Mongolian student.

headline.print_headline: Japanese Wrestling Champion Suffers First Loss in 13 Years
headline.main: Japanese Wrestling Champion Suffers First Loss in 13 Years
